mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_ST_LOGINLOG ( XXZJBH, ASJBH, CXR_SFZH, CXR_XM, CXR_JH, CXR_LXDH, CXR_DLSJ ) VALUES ( #{xxzjbh}, #{asjbh}, #{cxrSfzh }, #{cxrXm }, #{cxrJh }, #{cxrLxdh }, SYSDATE)
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_ST_LOGINLOG t
and t.CXR_SFZH like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{cxrSfzh}),'%')
and t.CXR_XM like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{cxrXm}),'%')
and t.CXR_JH like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{cxrJh}),'%')
and t.CXR_LXDH like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{cxrLxdh}),'%')
and t.ASJBH like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{asjbh}),'%')
and t.CXR_DLSJ >= to_date(#{cxrKssj},'yyyy-MM-dd')
and t.CXR_DLSJ < to_date(#{cxrJssj},'yyyy-MM-dd')
